title: Opinion: My son had rotavirus before he could get the vaccine. Ending universal rotavirus vaccination is a tragedy
description: A rotavirus expert’s baby caught the disease before vaccines were available. He’s seen firsthand why the vaccine, recently downgraded on the vaccination schedule, is so important.
content: A rotavirus expert’s baby caught the disease before vaccines were available. He’s seen firsthand why the vaccine, recently downgraded on the vaccination schedule, is so important.
